title: How many times a day should I reprogramme my subconscious mind? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can believe me or not, but it won't get you anywhere. A waste of time and attention. You are simply wasting your energy. All the necessary programs that are stored in your brain are already in place. It is better for you not to redo, but to improve the constructive that is already available. All sorts of ideas, according to the self-examination of your mind, came to you from outside, these ideas are foreign, and you will not benefit from it.

How many times a day should I reprogramme my subconscious mind? Its being reprogrammed constantly - without conscious effort And the conscious is not the tool for programming. Using conscious thought is about the same as changing the theme on your computer desktop and thinking that has changed the code of the OS
